job.name: Garfield
job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} echo $INPUTFILE0 | grep ':' if (! $?) then set fin = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $1}'` set f = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $2}'` else set fin = $INPUTFILE0 set f = 1000 endif set logFile = ${fin}_${f}B.log if ( -e ${logFile}) exit 0; root.exe -q -b lGarfield.C 'tpc.C+("'${fin}'",'${f}')' >& ${logFile}
